section.title: RP 8 part 1

list_item.paragraph: Helper functions using the accumulator pattern

section.paragraph: The review problem set for today contains three review problems.
This first problem is based on the split function that was previously described.

section.title: RP 8 part 2
section.paragraph: This problem will have you use the split function to implement an efficient sorting algorithm.

section.title: RP 8 part 3
section.paragraph: This problem will give you a lot more practice with the accumulator pattern. It is a randomized problem. You have to solve it three times in a row.
